statements: SELECT * FROM InventoryTracking
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM InventoryTracking ORDER BY current_stock DESC
SELECT id, product_name, optimal_stock FROM InventoryTracking WHERE current_stock > 50
SELECT * FROM InventoryTracking WHERE stockout_alert = TRUE
SELECT product_name, current_stock, optimal_stock FROM InventoryTracking ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT * FROM InventoryTracking WHERE current_stock > optimal_stock;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM InventoryTracking WHERE current_stock < 50;
SELECT id, product_name, optimal_stock FROM InventoryTracking WHERE stockout_alert = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM InventoryTracking WHERE current_stock = optimal_stock AND stockout_alert = TRUE;
SELECT id, product_name, current_stock, optimal_stock FROM InventoryTracking WHERE current_stock < 100 AND optimal_stock > 50;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels ORDER BY current_stock DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock < min_stock_level;
SELECT product_name, max_stock_level FROM inventory_levels WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM stockout_history WHERE stockout_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS total_stockouts FROM stockout_history GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_stockouts > 5;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock < min_stock_level ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, max_stock_level FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock > max_stock_level
SELECT * FROM stockout_history WHERE stockout_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY current_stock DESC
SELECT DISTINCT product_name, stockout_reason FROM inventory_levels i JOIN stockout_history s ON i.product_id = s.product_id ORDER BY product_name
SELECT * FROM products
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products WHERE stock_level > 10
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM products WHERE product_id = 3
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT product_id, current_stock, optimal_stock FROM stock_levels
SELECT * FROM products WHERE stock_level > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM products WHERE stock_level BETWEEN 20 AND 50;
SELECT products.product_name, orders.quantity FROM products INNER JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id;

SELECT orders.order_id, products.product_name, orders.quantity, orders.order_date FROM orders INNER JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id WHERE orders.quantity > 10 ORDER BY orders.order_date DESC;

SELECT products.product_name, stock_levels.current_stock, stock_levels.optimal_stock FROM products LEFT JOIN stock_levels ON products.product_id = stock_levels.product_id WHERE stock_levels.current_stock < stock_levels.optimal_stock;
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock > 0;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_number FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock, optimal_stock FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock < optimal_stock;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_quantity FROM Orders WHERE order_quantity >= 100;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock < optimal_stock ORDER BY product_name DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, current_stock, optimal_stock, (current_stock - optimal_stock) AS stock_difference FROM Inventory WHERE current_stock > optimal_stock ORDER BY stock_difference ASC
SELECT product_name, current_stock, optimal_stock, supplier_name FROM Inventory JOIN Suppliers ON Inventory.product_id = Suppliers.supplier_id ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT supplier_name, count(*) AS total_orders FROM Suppliers JOIN Orders ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Orders.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING total_orders > 5 ORDER BY total_orders DESC
SELECT product_name, stockout_date, recovery_date FROM Inventory JOIN Stockouts ON Inventory.product_id = Stockouts.product_id WHERE stockout_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY stockout_date ASC
SELECT * FROM inventory_items;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM warehouses WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT item_name, quantity, reorder_level FROM inventory_items ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT item_name, action, quantity_changed FROM stock_history WHERE action = 'Restocked' ORDER BY change_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_items WHERE optimal_level IS NOT NULL AND reorder_level IS NOT NULL;
SELECT warehouse_name, location FROM warehouses WHERE warehouse_id = 3;
SELECT order_id, item_id, quantity_ordered, order_date FROM stock_orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, action, quantity_changed FROM inventory_items JOIN stock_history ON inventory_items.item_id = stock_history.item_id WHERE action = 'stock_adjustment';
